summary: Verified the separate orders fix - each order submission creates a NEW order document (no merging). Backend APIs pass 100%, frontend UI correctly shows 'Date' column instead of 'Last Submitted', and order details dialog does NOT show 'Submission History' section. Multiple orders for same student are displayed as separate rows.
passed_tests: Admin login at /admin/login with admin@chipi.co / admin works
POST /api/store/textbook-orders/submit creates NEW order document each time (verified with multiple submissions)
Multiple submissions for same student result in separate order rows (Test Student Admin has 7+ separate orders)
Each order has unique order_id, correct items, total_amount, and status='submitted'
GET /api/store/textbook-orders/admin/all returns all orders as separate documents
GET /api/store/textbook-orders/student/{student_id} returns available books for browsing
Admin table shows 'Date' column instead of 'Last Submitted' (verified via Playwright)
Order details dialog does NOT show 'Submission History' section (verified via Playwright)
critical_code_review_comments: textbook_order_service.create_and_submit_order (line 566-783) correctly creates new order document for each submission
textbook_order_repository.get_by_student (line 33) now only returns draft orders, not submitted orders
TextbookOrdersAdminTab.jsx order dialog correctly excludes submission history section
seed_data_creation: Created test orders during testing for student std_test_admin_001 (TEST_Separate_Orders_*, TEST_Multi_Order*)

verified_data.orders_for_test_student: 7+ separate orders for Test Student Admin (std_test_admin_001)

observations: Separate orders feature working correctly - each POST /api/store/textbook-orders/submit creates new order
Admin panel correctly displays multiple orders for same student as separate rows
UI changes verified: 'Date' column shown, 'Last Submitted' removed, 'Submission History' section removed from dialog
context_for_next_testing_agent: Separate orders feature is fully functional. Test student std_test_admin_001 now has multiple separate orders. Test credentials: admin@chipi.co / admin. The submit endpoint creates new orders each time, repository only returns draft orders for browsing.
